**1. Document Existing Schema for Beckn Registry in a excel sheet** -p1
2. Define DeDi Schema for Beckn Registry

4. Create a strapi pugin for /subscribe & /lookup which will be talking to DeDi endpoint --
5. Document /lookup & /subscribe implementation in existing registry framework
**5. Create API documentation for Registry UI**  --p1
6. Develop API Endpointd discussed in point 5

8. Create UI for Registry Along with API Integration

1. This migration is only for BOC or for all environment? because we need to make changes in protocol server to support this.
2. Will there be any usage of gateway after this migration? if Not who will broadcast the search request
3. Do we need to update the ONIX script as well to install Beckn one registry instead of legacy beckn registry.
4. is this a proper decentralization of registry or just a mock implementation. If it is a decentralized system will the registry talk to other registry.
